## Contribution Checklist

### Required

- [ ] Methodology JSON is valid (run `npm run validate methodologies/your-file.json`)
- [ ] All required fields completed
- [ ] At least 2 stages with detailed guidance
- [ ] Quality criteria specified for each stage
- [ ] At least 1 published example study provided
- [ ] Tested locally with sample data in QualAI
- [ ] Proper citations included (APA + BibTeX)
- [ ] License specified (default: CC-BY-4.0)
- [ ] No sensitive or proprietary information included

### Recommended

- [ ] Common pitfalls identified for each stage
- [ ] Learning resources provided
- [ ] Multiple example studies (diverse contexts)
- [ ] Related methodologies specified
- [ ] Tool parameter mappings included

- **Stages completed:** <!-- Which stages did you test? -->

**Issues encountered during testing:**

- [ ] This is based on published literature with proper citation

## Author Agreement

By submitting this pull request, I confirm that:

- [ ] I have read and agree to the [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I agree to license this methodology under CC-BY-4.0 (or specified alternative)
- [ ] All citations and attributions are accurate and complete
- [ ] I will support users who have questions about this methodology
- [ ] I understand this will be publicly available and freely usable

## For Reviewers

<!-- Reviewers: Please check these before approving -->

### Methodological Review

- [ ] Methodology is based on peer-reviewed literature
- [ ] Clear epistemological positioning
- [ ] Well-defined stages/phases
- [ ] Quality criteria are appropriate
- [ ] Examples are relevant and well-explained

### Technical Review

- [ ] JSON structure is valid
- [ ] All required fields present
- [ ] Tool mappings are correct
- [ ] No syntax errors
- [ ] Filename matches methodology ID

### Usability Review

- [ ] Instructions are clear and actionable
- [ ] Language is accessible (jargon explained)
- [ ] Examples are helpful
- [ ] Common pitfalls addressed
- [ ] Resources are high-quality
